Headline: #44 Wallace/Racine Temporary Reroute at Racine/51st
ShortDescription: 44 Wallace/Racine buses are temporarily rerouted via Racine, Garfield, Loomis, 51st, and Racine due to, street blockage near Racine/51st.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#44 Wallace/Racine buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Racine, Garfield, Loomis, 51st, and Racine due to, street blockage near Racine/51st.

Allow extra travel time.
